00001 /**********************************************************************
00002 * $Id$          uart_hw_flow_control.c                          2010-06-10
00003 */
00026 #include "lpc17xx_uart.h"
00027 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00028 #include "lpc17xx_pinsel.h"
00029 
00030 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00036 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS *************************/
00037 #define TEST_UART (LPC_UART_TypeDef *)LPC_UART1
00038 
00039 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00040 uint8_t menu1[] = "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r";
00041 uint8_t menu2[] = "UART hardware flow control mode demo \n\r\t MCU LPC17xx - ARM Cortex-M3 \n\r\t UART1 - 9600bps \n\r";
00042 uint8_t menu3[] = "UART demo terminated!";
00043 
00044 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTIONS *************************/
00045 void print_menu(void);
00046 
00047 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00048 /*********************************************************************/
00053 void print_menu(void)
00054 {
00055         UART_Send(TEST_UART, menu1, sizeof(menu1), BLOCKING);
00056         UART_Send(TEST_UART, menu2, sizeof(menu2), BLOCKING);
00057 }
00058 
00059 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00060 /*********************************************************************/
00065 int c_entry(void)
00066 {
00067         // UART Configuration structure variable
00068         UART_CFG_Type UARTConfigStruct;
00069         // UART FIFO configuration Struct variable
00070         UART_FIFO_CFG_Type UARTFIFOConfigStruct;
00071         // Pin configuration for UART0
00072         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00073 
00074         uint32_t idx, len;
00075         __IO FlagStatus exitflag;
00076         uint8_t buffer[10];
00077 
00078         /*
00079          * Initialize UART1 pin connect
00080          */
00081         PinCfg.Funcnum = 2;
00082         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00083         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00084         PinCfg.Pinnum = 0;
00085         PinCfg.Portnum = 2;
00086         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);//P2.0 TXD1
00087         PinCfg.Pinnum = 1;
00088         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);//P2.1 RXD1
00089         PinCfg.Pinnum = 2;
00090         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);//P2.2 CTS1
00091         PinCfg.Pinnum = 7;
00092         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);//P2.7 RTS1
00093 
00094         /* Initialize UART Configuration parameter structure to default state:
00095          * Baudrate = 9600bps
00096          * 8 data bit
00097          * 1 Stop bit
00098          * None parity
00099          */
00100         UART_ConfigStructInit(&UARTConfigStruct);
00101 
00102         // Initialize UART0 peripheral with given to corresponding parameter
00103         UART_Init(TEST_UART, &UARTConfigStruct);
00104 
00105         /* Initialize FIFOConfigStruct to default state:
00106          *                              - FIFO_DMAMode = DISABLE
00107          *                              - FIFO_Level = UART_FIFO_TRGLEV0
00108          *                              - FIFO_ResetRxBuf = ENABLE
00109          *                              - FIFO_ResetTxBuf = ENABLE
00110          *                              - FIFO_State = ENABLE
00111          */
00112         UART_FIFOConfigStructInit(&UARTFIFOConfigStruct);
00113 
00114         // Initialize FIFO for UART0 peripheral
00115         UART_FIFOConfig(TEST_UART, &UARTFIFOConfigStruct);
00116 
00117         // Configure UART1 hardware flow control RTS/CTS
00118         UART_FullModemForcePinState((LPC_UART1_TypeDef *)LPC_UART1,UART1_MODEM_PIN_RTS,ACTIVE);
00119 
00120         // Enable UART Transmit
00121         UART_TxCmd(TEST_UART, ENABLE);
00122 
00123         // print welcome screen
00124         print_menu();
00125 
00126         // Reset exit flag
00127         exitflag = RESET;
00128 
00129     /* Read some data from the buffer */
00130     while (exitflag == RESET)
00131     {
00132        len = 0;
00133         while (len == 0)
00134         {
00135             len = UART_Receive(TEST_UART, buffer, sizeof(buffer), NONE_BLOCKING);
00136         }
00137 
00138         /* Got some data */
00139         idx = 0;
00140         while (idx < len)
00141         {
00142             if (buffer[idx] == 27)
00143             {
00144                 /* ESC key, set exit flag */
00145                 UART_Send(TEST_UART, menu3, sizeof(menu3), BLOCKING);
00146                 exitflag = SET;
00147             }
00148             else if (buffer[idx] == 'r')
00149             {
00150                 print_menu();
00151             }
00152             else
00153             {
00154                 /* Echo it back */
00155                 UART_Send(TEST_UART, &buffer[idx], 1, BLOCKING);
00156             }
00157             idx++;
00158         }
00159     }
00160 
00161     // wait for current transmission complete - THR must be empty
00162     while (UART_CheckBusy(TEST_UART) == SET);
00163 
00164     // DeInitialize UART0 peripheral
00165     UART_DeInit(TEST_UART);
00166 
00167     /* Loop forever */
00168     while(1);
00169     return 1;
00170 }
00171 
00172 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00173    allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00174    heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00175    toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00176    file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00177 int main(void)
00178 {
00179     return c_entry();
00180 }

00186 *                               where the CHECK_PARAM error has occurred.
00187 * @param[in]    file Pointer to the source file name
00188 * @param[in]    line assert_param error line source number
00189 * @return               None
00190 *******************************************************************************/
00191 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line)
00192 {
00193         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00194          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00195

00197         while(1);
00198 }
